span.style: font-size:18; font-family:Comic Sans MS; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; color:#550000
font-size:14; font-family:微软雅黑; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; color:#000000

item.answer:
【考法 1】 vt. 拒绝承认，否认： to disclaim knowledge of, responsibility for, or association with；to declare not to be true
【例】 disavow the rumor 否认谣言
【例】She disavowed the testimony证词 that she had given earlier in the trial.
【近】 deny, repudiate, disaffirm, disclaim, disconfirm, gainsay[geɪn'seɪ], negate
【反】 acknowledge, avow, concede 承认
